tasks.title: Create Project Repository Structure
tasks.description: Set up the repository structure for the book project with appropriate folders for chapters, appendices, and resources.
tasks.details:
Create a Git repository with the following structure:
- /chapters/ (for all chapter_XX.md files)
- /appendices/ (for all appendix materials)
- /resources/ (for templates, frameworks, and tools)
- /reviews/ (for feedback and revision notes)
- README.md (project overview)
- CONTRIBUTING.md (guidelines for contributors)

Ensure proper version control and documentation of the repository structure.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that all directories are created correctly and accessible. Test the repository cloning process to ensure all collaborators can access the structure properly.

tasks.title: Audit Existing Chapter Files
tasks.description: Review all existing chapter_XX.md files to identify what has been created and what needs to be developed or refined.
tasks.details:
Create an inventory spreadsheet listing:
- All existing chapter files (chapter_XX.md)
- Current status (draft, review needed, complete)
- Word count
- Key topics covered
- Missing elements
- Alignment with structure in ebook_structure.md

This audit will serve as the baseline for all subsequent refinement tasks.

Note: Subtasks have been created for developing missing chapters (17-19) and appendices (A-G) with initial status 'a desenvolver'.
tasks.testStrategy: Cross-reference the inventory with ebook_structure.md to ensure all planned chapters are accounted for. Validate that the audit captures all necessary metadata for decision-making. Ensure the audit includes the newly created chapter files (17-19) and appendices (A-G).

tasks.title: Develop Chapter Review Framework
tasks.description: Create a standardized framework for reviewing and refining each chapter to ensure consistency and quality across the book.
tasks.details:
Develop a review template that includes:
- Structural elements check (introduction, key concepts, practical applications, conclusion)
- Target audience alignment assessment
- Practical value evaluation
- Clarity and readability metrics
- Connection to overall book narrative
- Differentiation factors

The framework should be applicable to all chapters and help maintain consistency throughout the book.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the framework on 2-3 sample chapters to ensure it captures all necessary aspects of review. Adjust based on initial findings before full implementation.

tasks.title: Review and Refine Part 1: Fundamentals Chapters
tasks.description: Apply the review framework to the Fundamentals section chapters, ensuring they provide a solid foundation for readers new to AI in product management.
tasks.details:
For each chapter in Part 1:
1. Apply the review framework
2. Ensure concepts are explained clearly for the target audience
3. Verify that foundational AI concepts are accessible to non-technical executives
4. Add practical examples relevant to traditional industries
5. Strengthen connections between AI fundamentals and product management
6. Update content with latest AI developments and trends
7. Implement revisions in the respective chapter_XX.md files
tasks.testStrategy: Have sample readers from the target audience (especially those with less technical background) review the revised chapters and provide feedback on clarity and applicability.

tasks.title: Review and Refine Part 2: Methodology Chapters
tasks.description: Apply the review framework to the Methodology section chapters, ensuring they provide actionable frameworks and approaches for implementing AI in product management.
tasks.details:
For each chapter in Part 2:
1. Apply the review framework
2. Validate that methodologies are presented in step-by-step, actionable formats
3. Enhance practical examples and case studies
4. Ensure frameworks are adaptable to different industry contexts
5. Add visual diagrams and process flows where helpful
6. Include decision-making tools and assessment frameworks
7. Implement revisions in the respective chapter_XX.md files
tasks.testStrategy: Test the methodologies by creating simplified worksheets and having product managers attempt to apply them to hypothetical scenarios. Gather feedback on usability and clarity.

tasks.title: Review and Refine Part 3: Case Studies Chapters
tasks.description: Apply the review framework to the Case Studies section, ensuring they provide relevant, insightful examples from traditional industries implementing AI solutions.
tasks.details:
For each chapter in Part 3:
1. Apply the review framework
2. Verify case studies represent diverse industries and company sizes
3. Enhance the problem-solution-outcome structure of each case
4. Add metrics and measurable results where possible
5. Include lessons learned and pitfalls to avoid
6. Ensure cases connect back to the methodologies in Part 2
7. Implement revisions in the respective chapter_XX.md files
tasks.testStrategy: Have industry experts review the case studies for accuracy and relevance. Ensure the cases provide actionable insights that readers can apply to their own contexts.

tasks.title: Review and Refine Part 4: Leadership Chapters
tasks.description: Apply the review framework to the Leadership section, ensuring it addresses the unique challenges leaders face when driving AI transformation in traditional organizations.
tasks.details:
For each chapter in Part 4:
1. Apply the review framework
2. Enhance content on change management and organizational transformation
3. Add guidance on building AI capabilities and teams
4. Include strategies for overcoming resistance and cultural barriers
5. Develop leadership frameworks specific to AI transformation
6. Add executive decision-making tools and assessment guides
7. Implement revisions in the respective chapter_XX.md files
tasks.testStrategy: Have C-level executives and senior leaders review the content for relevance and applicability to their challenges. Gather feedback on whether the guidance addresses their most pressing leadership concerns.

tasks.title: Develop and Refine Appendices with Practical Tools
tasks.description: Create and refine appendices containing practical tools, templates, and frameworks that readers can immediately apply in their organizations.
tasks.details:
For each appendix:
1. Develop practical tools aligned with the book's methodology
2. Create downloadable templates in multiple formats (PDF, spreadsheet, etc.)
3. Design assessment frameworks and scoring systems
4. Create checklists for implementation phases
5. Develop ROI calculators and business case templates
6. Include a glossary of AI and product management terms
7. Organize appendices logically to complement the main content
tasks.testStrategy: Test all tools and templates with practitioners to ensure they are intuitive, valuable, and immediately applicable. Verify that digital versions are properly formatted and functional.

tasks.title: Conduct Expert Review Simulations
tasks.description: Simulate expert reviews from different target audiences (CEOs, product leaders, engineering managers) to validate content relevance and value.
tasks.details:
For each target audience segment:
1. Create personas representing different reader profiles
2. Develop review criteria specific to each persona's needs and interests
3. Simulate reviews from each perspective, identifying strengths and gaps
4. Document feedback and recommendations for improvement
5. Prioritize changes based on criticality and audience importance
6. Create an action plan for implementing high-priority changes

This simulation will help ensure the book addresses the specific needs of all target audiences.
tasks.testStrategy: Compare simulation results across different personas to identify common themes and divergent needs. Validate that the book adequately addresses the unique requirements of each audience segment.

tasks.title: Cross-Chapter Consistency and Flow Review
tasks.description: Review the entire book for narrative consistency, logical flow between chapters, and elimination of unnecessary repetition.
tasks.details:
Conduct a comprehensive review focusing on:
1. Consistent terminology and definitions across chapters
2. Logical progression of concepts from basic to advanced
3. Appropriate cross-references between related sections
4. Balanced coverage of topics based on importance
5. Consistent tone and writing style throughout
6. Elimination of redundant content
7. Identification of content gaps requiring additional material

Create a detailed report of findings and recommended changes.
tasks.testStrategy: Have a fresh reviewer read through the entire manuscript sequentially to identify flow issues, inconsistencies, and gaps that might not be apparent when reviewing individual chapters.

tasks.title: Implement Revision Recommendations
tasks.description: Implement all high-priority revisions identified through the review processes to prepare the final manuscript.
tasks.details:
For each chapter and appendix:
1. Consolidate feedback from all review processes
2. Prioritize changes based on impact and effort
3. Implement high-priority revisions first
4. Update cross-references and ensure consistency
5. Enhance visual elements and diagrams
6. Verify all citations and references
7. Update chapter_XX.md files with final content
tasks.testStrategy: After implementing changes, conduct a verification review to ensure all high-priority issues have been addressed and no new issues have been introduced.

tasks.title: Translate Book to Brazilian Portuguese
tasks.description: Translate the entire book from English to Brazilian Portuguese, ensuring proper localization and cultural adaptation.
tasks.details:
For each chapter and appendix:
1. Translate content maintaining the original meaning and intent
2. Adapt industry-specific terminology for the Brazilian market
3. Localize examples and case studies where necessary
4. Adjust cultural references to resonate with Brazilian readers
5. Ensure consistent Portuguese terminology throughout
6. Create Brazilian Portuguese versions of all diagrams and visual elements
7. Save translated chapters as chapter_XX_pt_BR.md
tasks.testStrategy: Have native Brazilian Portuguese speakers review the translation for accuracy, fluency, and cultural appropriateness. Test comprehension with sample readers from the Brazilian target audience.

subtasks.title: Create Brazilian Portuguese Terminology Glossary
subtasks.description: Develop a comprehensive glossary of industry-specific terms and their Brazilian Portuguese equivalents to ensure consistency throughout the translation.
subtasks.details: Review the entire book to identify key technical terms, jargon, and recurring phrases. Research appropriate Brazilian Portuguese equivalents, consulting with subject matter experts if necessary. Document all terms in a spreadsheet with columns for English term, Brazilian Portuguese translation, context notes, and usage examples.
subtasks.testStrategy: Have a native Brazilian Portuguese speaker with industry knowledge review the glossary for accuracy and cultural appropriateness.

subtasks.title: Translate Chapters 1-5
subtasks.description: Translate the first five chapters from English to Brazilian Portuguese while maintaining the original meaning and intent.
subtasks.details: Using the terminology glossary as reference, translate each chapter sequentially. Focus on conveying the meaning rather than literal translation. Maintain the original formatting, headings, and paragraph structure. Save each translated chapter as chapter_0X_pt_BR.md where X is the chapter number.
subtasks.testStrategy: Perform a readability check by having a native speaker read through the translated content to ensure it flows naturally.

subtasks.title: Translate Chapters 6-10
subtasks.description: Translate the middle five chapters from English to Brazilian Portuguese while maintaining the original meaning and intent.
subtasks.details: Continue the translation process for chapters 6-10 using the established glossary. Ensure consistency with previously translated chapters. Pay special attention to technical explanations and ensure they remain accurate in Portuguese. Save each translated chapter as chapter_0X_pt_BR.md or chapter_X_pt_BR.md as appropriate.
subtasks.testStrategy: Compare key sections with the English original to verify no content has been omitted or misinterpreted.

subtasks.title: Translate Remaining Chapters and Appendices
subtasks.description: Complete the translation of all remaining chapters and appendices from English to Brazilian Portuguese.
subtasks.details: Translate the remaining chapters and all appendices following the established process. Maintain consistency with previously translated sections. For appendices, save files as appendix_X_pt_BR.md where X is the appendix identifier. Update the table of contents to reflect the Brazilian Portuguese chapter titles.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review transitions between chapters to ensure the narrative flows smoothly across the entire translated book.

subtasks.title: Adapt Examples and Case Studies
subtasks.description: Localize all examples, case studies, and practical scenarios to be relevant and relatable to Brazilian readers.
subtasks.details: Review all examples and case studies throughout the translated content. Replace US/UK-specific examples with Brazilian equivalents where appropriate. Adapt company names, currencies, measurements, and legal references to Brazilian standards. Ensure examples remain technically accurate after adaptation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Have Brazilian industry professionals review the adapted examples for relevance and cultural appropriateness.

subtasks.title: Translate and Adapt Visual Elements
subtasks.description: Create Brazilian Portuguese versions of all diagrams, charts, tables, and other visual elements in the book.
subtasks.details: Identify all visual elements requiring translation. Extract text from diagrams and charts, translate using the terminology glossary, and reinsert into the visuals. Maintain the original design and layout. For complex diagrams, work with a graphic designer if necessary. Save all translated visuals in a dedicated folder with consistent naming convention.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct side-by-side comparisons with original visuals to ensure all elements have been properly translated and no visual information has been lost.

subtasks.title: Perform Terminology and Consistency Review
subtasks.description: Review the entire translated book to ensure consistent terminology, style, and tone throughout all chapters and appendices.
subtasks.details: Conduct a comprehensive review of the entire translated content. Check for consistent use of terminology according to the glossary. Verify that style and tone remain consistent across chapters translated at different times. Standardize formatting of headings, lists, and special text elements. Create a list of any inconsistencies found and corrections made.
subtasks.testStrategy: Use text analysis tools to identify inconsistent terminology usage and verify corrections have been properly implemented.

subtasks.title: Finalize and Package Translated Book
subtasks.description: Perform final quality checks, compile all translated content, and prepare the complete Brazilian Portuguese version of the book for publication.
subtasks.details: Conduct a final proofreading of all translated content. Check for any formatting issues, broken links, or reference errors. Compile all chapter files, appendices, and visual elements into the final book structure. Update the index and table of contents with correct page references. Create a final package with all translated files organized according to the original book structure.
subtasks.testStrategy: Have a professional editor who is a native Brazilian Portuguese speaker perform a final review of the complete book for language quality and publishing standards.

tasks.title: Adapt Case Studies for Brazilian Market
tasks.description: Review and adapt case studies to ensure relevance and applicability to the Brazilian business context.
tasks.details:
For each case study:
1. Evaluate relevance to the Brazilian market
2. Replace or adapt cases that are too US/Europe-centric
3. Add Brazilian companies as examples where possible
4. Adjust metrics and KPIs to reflect Brazilian business realities
5. Consider regulatory and market differences that affect AI implementation
6. Update references to reflect Brazilian industry standards
7. Ensure examples resonate with Brazilian business culture
tasks.testStrategy: Have Brazilian business leaders and product managers review the adapted case studies for relevance and applicability to their market context.

tasks.title: Final Quality Assurance Review
tasks.description: Conduct a comprehensive quality assurance review of both language versions to ensure readiness for publication.
tasks.details:
For both English and Portuguese versions:
1. Proofread for spelling, grammar, and punctuation errors
2. Verify formatting consistency across all chapters
3. Check all links, references, and citations
4. Ensure all diagrams and visual elements are properly displayed
5. Verify cross-references between chapters
6. Test all downloadable resources and tools
7. Create a final QA report documenting any remaining issues
tasks.testStrategy: Use a combination of automated tools and manual review to identify errors. Have independent reviewers check a sample of chapters to verify quality standards are met.

tasks.title: Prepare Final Publication Package
tasks.description: Compile all finalized content into a publication-ready package for both English and Portuguese versions.
tasks.details:
For each language version:
1. Organize all chapter files in final sequence
2. Compile appendices and supplementary materials
3. Create a comprehensive table of contents
4. Prepare front matter (title page, copyright, acknowledgments)
5. Prepare back matter (index, about the author)
6. Package all downloadable resources
7. Create publication metadata (ISBN, author info, etc.)

Ensure all materials are properly formatted for the intended publication platforms.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify the complete package by generating test versions in all intended formats (PDF, EPUB, etc.) and reviewing them on multiple devices to ensure proper display and functionality.
